title: moaddeli.github.io
text:
Hello, I am Hamid R. Moaddeli, an Iranian computer scientist. I have a master’s degree in Computer Science and Engineering obtained at the Shiraz University in Iran, 2008. and currently working as a freelance software developer, consultant and trainer in Shiraz, Iran.
My interests include:

Software Development in Python ecosystem especially for scientific application
Data Science, Machine Learning & Deep Learning development
Big Data application and tools
Application of artificial intelligence in medical science
